authToken - Class in shared.communication
An authToken is used to tell a client whether a server operation was able to continue or not, based on provided user credentials.

Constructs a normal user
authToken(int) - Constructor for class shared.communication.authToken

B

batch - Class in shared.model
A batch of records to be indexed by a user

Constructs a new batch.
batchBlob - Class in shared.communication
a batchBlob contains a batch which is being sent from a server to a client.

Constructs a new batchBlob, empty
batchProposal - Class in shared.communication
a batchProposal is the means whereby clients attempt to submit indexed batches to the server

C

client - package client
 
communicator - Class in client
this is the object responsible for letting the server know what the client wants to do and letting the client know how it went with the server.
communicator(String) - Constructor for class client.communicator
starts the communicator class, which can then communicate with a server using communication tokens

searchProposal - Class in shared.communication
